Description: Sandal, one of a pair (see big.no = 71906) made of palm fibre, probably right foot. One-under-one plait, two thicknesses of fibre hence flimsy. Rear end folded over but not properly continued. Tie knotted beneath front and rear. Perhaps originally tie behind the ankle.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), 763 room 8 west end floor 1 floor 2
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405578001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
